hero.title: Your Professional Identity on Web3
hero.description: Build your verifiable professional profile on the blockchain. Showcase your skills, credentials, and achievements with full ownership and privacy control.

features.title: Your Professional Identity, Reimagined
features.description: Experience the future of professional networking with blockchain-verified credentials, complete data ownership, and enhanced privacy controls.

verifiable.title: Verifiable Credentials
verifiable.description: Showcase your skills and achievements with blockchain-verified credentials and Soulbound Tokens.

base.title: Base Integration
base.description: Built on Base blockchain for optimal performance and seamless user experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Control
privacy.description: Full control over your data with wallet-based authentication and selective disclosure.

profile.title: Custom Profile
profile.description: Personalize your professional identity with Basenames and customizable profile elements.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with professionals through decentralized networking features.

ai.title: AI-Enhanced
